name: Wave the surfer
description:
Hey, this is my submission to Global Game Jam 2017.

It was long two day/night jam. And big challenge for me, i've never done water physics, so i spend alot of time to make it work. 

In timelapse you can see, that i come up with super simple  idea how it will work, in last night of jam :)

Control wave with mouse to make some cool tricks with surfer.

Timelapse Video
